settings.popup_text: Our first-ever combination of omega fatty acids and powerful probiotics allows your brain and gut to say “hello” to one another like never before. Nicknamed the body’s “second brain,” the gut is constantly communicating with the rest of your body. In fact, 90% of your body’s serotonin (known as the “feel good” hormone) is located in the gut, which means that a healthy gut is a happy self. Adding in a double dose of brain power are the omega fatty acids in Ahiflower oil, which have important roles in cognitive health and daily function.*
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: Your gut is the cornerstone of your health. Trillions of microorganisms in the gut are constantly on the job to maintain your bodily functions, from digestion to immune response. When we expose our bodies to things that break up this system, such as excessive stress or a lack of diversity in the diet, we run into problems. It is critical to nourish your gut with good, living bacteria to enable you and the life inside of you to flourish.*
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: Your gut houses 70% of your immune system, which means that the bacteria living in your intestines are largely responsible for your immunity. In order for your body to stay in tip-top shape, you must feed your gut with good, living bacteria, which in-turn, supports your immune system’s ability to fend off foreign invaders. To make it quick and easy for you to reap these benefits, we included targeted probiotic strains to do just that, so you can focus your time and energy on things in your life that matter most.*
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: Nouri's blend of probiotics combined with omega oils supports your digestive system to process and absorb nutrients. By supporting the health of your digestive system everyday, your body can more easily utilize the nutrients it craves.*
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: Nouri's superstar flower- Ahiflower- is the source of our omega-rich oil so that you obtain your omegas from a 100% plant-based and vegan source. Also known as  Buglossoides Arvensis, this flower species is your best omega value from a single, sustainable and traceable plant.*

settings.title: The good bacteria in your body are just as diverse as you are.
settings.content:
Our Women’s Health product is formulated specially for super women such as yourself.

Each power capsule boasts whole cranberry powder to support urinary tract health and probiotic strains to promote vaginal, digestive and immune health. Completing the picture are plant-based omega fatty acids for true flower power.*

settings.simple_heading_text: The only probiotics on the market to be combined with plant-based omegas.

settings.cover_title: 90% of how you feel starts in the gut.
settings.cover_text: It’s estimated that 90% of the body’s serotonin (the feel-good chemical in your body) is produced in the gut. So start where it matters most.

settings.popup_text: Nouri's proprietary blends are the first in the world to encapsulate and ensure the delivery of probiotics in Ahiflower® oil, a plant-based oil that contains omega fatty acids designed to support your body and brain.*
Science matters. Nouri is proud to offer products rooted and rich in clinical research with supply chain traceability.

settings.code: Join the Nouri family @dailynouri

settings.question_02: You have a questions and such.

settings.question_01: What types of probiotics and omega oils are in each capsule?
settings.answer_01: Each Nouri capsule contains five diverse strains of bacteria: Bifidobacterium longum, Bifidobacterium lactis, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus plantarum, and Lactobacillus brevis. These five strains are floating in, and protected by Ahiflower®oil, the best omega value from a single, sustainable, and traceable plant source.

settings.question: What are probiotics?
settings.answer: According to the World Health Organization (WHO), probiotics are live microorganisms, when consumed in adequate amounts, confer a health benefit on the host. That is a fancy way of saying, they are good, living bacteria that have a benefit when consuming them.

settings.question: I am not sure if I am having gut health issues. How do I know?
settings.answer: Gut health issues present themselves in many different ways that you can feel from head to toe. The most common way that gut health issues first present themselves is through an upset stomach. If you are experiencing bloating, discomfort after a meal, constipation, or heartburn you may be experiencing symptoms of an unhealthy gut. Other common symptoms of gut health issues can include unintentional weight changes, sleep disturbances, skin irritation, autoimmune conditions, and food intolerances. We always recommend consulting your physician when determining if you are experiencing gut health issues and before taking any new supplements.*

settings.question: If I don't have any gut health issues right now, why would I take Nouri?
settings.answer: If you are not experiencing gut issues today, you have the opportunity to take a proactive versus a reactive approach to your health. 70% of your immune system is located in your gut. This means that supplementing your diet with a probiotic supports your immune system in staying strong against the attacks that are to come. Further, a daily probiotic supports nutrient absorption. No matter how many superfoods you eat, your body cannot break them down without heathy bacteria. And ultimately, a body robust in healthy and diverse bacteria can impact your mood, and support your mental and emotional balance each and every day.*

settings.question: What are prebiotics? And how are they different from probiotics?
settings.answer: Prebiotics are a fiber that can be used by the good bacteria already found in your intestinal tract, grow better. Where probiotics add the good bacteria, prebiotics feed the good bacteria already there. You will find prebiotic fiber is present in many plant-based, whole foods.

settings.question: Does Nouri need to be taken with food?
settings.answer: Nouri can be taken with or without food. We suggest you take Nouri in the morning with a large glass of water.

settings.question: How often do I take probiotics?
settings.answer: For best results, Nouri recommends taking a probiotic daily and consistently during all stages of life.

settings.question: Do your probiotics require refrigeration?
settings.answer: Our probiotics do no require refrigeration. We partnered with one of the most trusted probiotic manufacturers in the world to ensure that Nouri's probiotics are developed, tested and manufactured for stability over 24 months. That said, it is important you store your probiotics out of heat, humidity, and in a cool place (under 77 F is best).

settings.question: Are your labs organic and non-GMO?
settings.answer: Yes, our probiotics come from a lab that is USDA certified organic and NON-GMO Project Verified by North America’s most trusted third-party verification organization.

settings.question: Why do you include Ahiflower oil in your products?
settings.answer: Research suggests that probiotics are better absorbed in the gut when they are accompanied by omega-3 oil. We set out to achieve that result, but with a sustainable omega oil that relieves the environmental pressure placed upon the marine system with the rising demand of fish oil. Plus, it also happens to be a super plant-based oil that delivers omega-3,6,9, which helps to support the body and brain.

settings.question: What are the omega fatty acid components of Ahiflower oil?
settings.answer: Ahiflower offers a rich single-plant source of omega-3 ALA (alpha-linolenic acid) and SDA (stearidonic acid); omega-6 GLA (gamma linolenic acid) and LA (linoleic acid); and omega-9 OA (oleic acid).

settings.question: How does Ahiflower oil compare to other plant oils like flax seed oil?
settings.answer: Most plant-sourced omega fatty acid oils contain omega-3 ALA and omega-6 LA. Few contain omega-6 GLA in meaningful quantities. Even fewer contain any SDA at all. Ahiflower is unique in that it contains ALL of these components, and its highest-available SDA content results in a far more efficient conversion to EPA in the body as compared to flax and other plant-based oils that primarily supply ALA. To put this into perspective, it would take 4 softgels of flax seed oil to yield the same amount of beneficial EPA in the body as 1 softgel of Ahiflower oil.

settings.question: How does Ahiflower oil compare to algal oil?
settings.answer: As with fish oils, algal oils contain EPA and/or DHA, while Ahiflower does not, but algal oils do not contain omega-6 GLA, which is prized for its cellular benefits, or omega-9 OA, which has been associated with cardiovascular health.

settings.question: How does Ahiflower oil compare to marine omega sources like fish and krill?
settings.answer: Ahiflower oil does not contain EPA or DHA, which are the main fatty acids present in marine oils (e.g., fish and krill) and algal oils. Ahiflower instead contains the omega-3s SDA (a precursor to EPA) and ALA at high levels. Our bodies naturally convert ALA and SDA to longer chain omega-3s, as needed, to support cell functioning. In addition, Ahiflower contains the omega-6 fatty acid GLA, which is recognized for its cellular benefits, and is not found in marine oils. People seeking a more sustainable, traceable, and single-plant source for omega 3-6-9 fatty acids can benefit from Ahiflower oil. Marine omega-3 fatty acid sources face issues related to finite supply, sustainability, possible contamination (e.g., bio-accumulation of heavy metals and radiation), formulation challenges, and are generally not appropriate for vegetarian or vegan diets.

settings.question: Is Ahiflower oil produced from a genetically modified organism (GMO)?
settings.answer: A big no to that! Our Ahiflower oil is non-GMO and each batch is tested free of pesticides and other potential impurities like heavy metals, PCBs, and PAHs.

settings.question: Is this product allergen-free?
settings.answer: Yes! Nouri's products are allergen-free.

settings.question: Are your products safe to be taken alongside other supplements or medications?
settings.answer: Nouri should be safe to take alongside other supplements or medication but as with any new introduction of supplements, we recommend first consulting with your doctor or healthcare practitioner.

settings.question: When is the best time to take a Nouri?
settings.answer: The best time of day to take a Nouri is in the morning. Remember that probiotics are living organisms, they need food water and warmth the thrive. So taking Nouri with breakfast or within 30 minutes beforehand is our highest recommendation. Also, studies show that your willpower is at its peak state in the morning, which makes it the best time of day to form healthy habits.

settings.question: Is Nouri vegan-friendly?
settings.answer: Yes! Nouri’s products are authentically vegan and free and clear of any possible source of animal products. In fact, with each Nouri product bought instead of marine-based fish oil, you can actually save the lives of animals, which is a fact we’re oh so very proud of.

settings.question: How and where should I store Nouri products?
settings.answer: It is best to store your Nouri products at room temperature and away from direct sunlight. Place in a spot where you'll remember to take it every day, because consistency is key here!

settings.question: Are Nouri products FDA approved?
settings.answer: By law, the FDA does not approve any dietary supplements. However the FDA does regulate dietary ingredients and supplements. All of Nouri's facilities follow Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) to ensure that Nouri's ingredients are tested and free from any yucky additives, heavy metals, microbes or unwanted contamination.

settings.question: Who was Nouri created for?
settings.answer: Nouri was created for men and women around the world who believe it is possible to increase their mental and physical health. We created Nouri in such a way to meet you wherever you are at but we care about you too much to leave you there. Increasing your life is a journey and Nouri is your partner along the way.

settings.question: How is Nouri different from other probiotic brands?
settings.answer: Nouri is committed to delivering uniquely better gut health solutions that empower people like you to take a proactive approach to personal gut health. Our products are rooted and rich in science and always labeled transparently so that you know exactly what you are putting in your body. Fun fact- we also happen to be the first in the world to deliver a 2-in-1 capsule technology containing probiotics and plant-based omega oil.

settings.question: Where in the world is Nouri?
settings.answer: Nouri is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia. Our probiotics are made in Wisconsin, capsules made in South Carolina, and Ahiflower oil made in England.

settings.question: What does “Nouri” mean?
settings.answer: Nouri is a word that means “light.” Our belief is that there is no darkness light cannot overcome. To achieve Nouri's mission of increasing life, we must first increase light.

settings.question: Who founded Nouri?
settings.answer: Nouri was founded in 2018 by American entrepreneur Caroline Beckman.

settings.question: What's next for Nouri?
settings.answer: Great question! One thing to know about Nouri is that we are motivated to give the very best to you, our consumer. What you can expect of us is a primary commitment to the cornerstone of life, which is the life inside your gut, delivered through our probiotics and then an ancillary focus on addressing other specific health issues such as skin, energy and mood.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: In your order confirmation email you will receive a tracking number. You can track your order by clicking the link on the unique tracking code. And as always, you can reach out 24/7 to hello@dailynouri.com to connect with the Nouri team.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We are bummed that you are unhappy with your probiotics and are going to refund you your first month in full.

settings.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
settings.answer: Need to stop your subscription? Head over to your account page and click “Manage Account.” From there, you will see a link at the bottom of your page to cancel. We’d love to hear from you when you do, so please reach out at hello@dailynouri.com.

settings.question: Ahiflower®
settings.answer: Ahiflower® is a naturally wild and now cultivated agricultural crop, grown by farmers in the United Kingdom. Each Ahiflower bloom produces up to four seeds. These seeds are pressed to produce a clean tasting oil that contains omega fatty acids.

  • Clean aroma and taste

settings.question: meet our manufacturer
settings.answer: Ahiflower is grown by an elite group of UK farmers and each field is carefully managed and monitored to the highest agricultural and environmental stewardship practices.

settings.title: Omega Oil
settings.content: Ahiflower oil supports your daily omega needs in the right balance.*

settings.question: Why Nouri?
settings.list_answer:
• No refrigeration necessary.
  • Labeling probiotics to the strain level. There are 3 parts to a bacterial name: genus, species and strain. Many products only show the first two, but here at Nouri we share the third one too. Each strain is genetically unique and health benefits can vary widely. Transparency of strain identification is the only way to trace it back to specific, science-supported health benefits.
  • The amount of bacteria (“CFU”) is guaranteed throughout the entirety of shelf life. Other probiotics can only guarantee CFU count at the time of manufacture, which is when the product is first made, but the Nouri way ensures you’ll get an effective amount, even on the final expiration date.
  • Delayed-release capsule technology to optimize absorption. Standard capsules cannot protect the probiotics through harsh internal conditions such as stomach acid and bile, but delayed-release capsules do. This sends the probiotics further along in your body to your gut, where they can do their work.

settings.question: Why take a probiotic?
settings.answer:
Immune health

Your gut houses 70% of your immune system, which means that the bacteria living in your intestines are largely responsible for your immunity. Feeding your gut with good, living bacteria supports your immune system’s ability to fend off foreign invaders.

Gut health

Some quick human anatomy: the gut is comprised of organs in your body that have a role in digestion, such as your mouth, stomach, and intestines. It also plays a huge role in whole body health. Trillions of microorganisms (microscopic living things) in the gut, such as bacteria, are constantly on the job to maintain bodily functions, from digesting the food you eat to regulating cognitive function.

settings.question: Supported by science
settings.answer: Nouri’s products are developed with quality over quantity in mind, with clinical studies supporting our ingredients. Additionally, our team of researchers conduct internal scientific research specific to our blends.

settings.question: Clean label
settings.answer: A recent GUMC study found that only 35% of probiotics on the market can be traced back to supporting science. This is because the other 65% are not labeling probiotics to the strain level, which is what enables us to link the probiotics to supporting science. When you see a Nouri label, you’ll know the full names of our probiotic strains and have our guarantee of CFU through end of shelf life. No poorly sourced ingredients and 100% plant-based.

settings.question: Delayed-release technology
settings.answer: Probiotics must endure an arduous journey through stomach acid and bile to reach the very last part of your digestive tract, which is why Nouri’s capsules are meticulously engineered to optimize absorption. In order to protect the precious life inside each capsule, we seal the probiotics in a second protective layer that features a delayed release technology to ensure the probiotics reach their final destination, safely and on time.

settings.question: 2-in-1 capsule
settings.answer: The only product on the market to deliver probiotics and plant-based omega oil in one capsule, so your body receives double benefits with just one daily effort by you. Targeted probiotics give your body the daily support it needs for digestive and immune health and plant-based omega fatty acids support your body and brain.*

settings.question: Plant-based omega oil
settings.answer: Increased commercial demand for fish oil has contributed to the long-range decline of sardine fisheries. Harvesting and consuming the oil in one acre of Ahiflower saves the lives of over 40,000 sardines or wild forage fish that would have otherwise been killed in the production of fish oil.

settings.subheading:
The way you are experiencing life right now has a lot to do with what’s happening in your gut. Nouri was founded upon the principle that increasing life begins in the very inside of your body, starting within your gut and radiating outwards.

We are a team of researchers, creatives and leaders committed to delivering gut health solutions to support the whole body.*

settings.paragraph_text: To be seen was the chase. Running as quickly as my feet could take me,  jump-starting a professional career at the age of 18 by dropping out of college to work for a successful health startup. This was the beginning of five years working an unmentionable amount of hours around the country each week.
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.paragraph_text:
To be seen was the chase. Running as quickly as my feet could take me,  jump-starting a professional career at the age of 18 by dropping out of college to work for a successful health startup. This was the beginning of five years working an unmentionable amount of hours around the country each week.

Seen feels great for so many reasons. It is tangible, publically celebrated, and initially satisfying. But what I learned was that the chase to be seen is so often a cover and it leaves what is most important unseen. My work life became quickly overshadowed by a shift in energy, mood, and focus. At the age of 21, my adrenals were failing. Essentially, I had “burned out” before I reached 22 years old. The most shocking thing was that I had trouble seeing what was right in front of me altogether. 

My mind raced between the depression of my invisible past and the anxiety of my invisible future. What had gone unseen below the surface of my career in “health and wellness” was the invisible battle inside of my body. The five and a half invisible inches stretching from my left ear to my right ear were battling to find practical and needed my help. I learned that the foundation from which my visible, healthy lifestyle was built on was crumbling. Research led me to understand that the invisible inside of me needed to be built before any health product would be effective. Protecting and infusing more life inside my body led to an increase in what is outwardly seen. 

I quickly learned my choices do not live in isolation from one another. The visible today will determine the invisible tomorrow. Nutritionally, the same is very true. By taking proactive versus reactive approaches to health, I believe we can reduce the symptoms of diseases that steal our loved ones each day. 

Very quickly it became impossible for me not to work on solving this problem. Cultural headlines of loss after loss remind me daily of how hard we are battling inside our minds and our bodies. How hard we are battling in the inside. In the spirit and desire to increase life, I am excited to introduce Nouri. A company focused on creating visible solutions today for the invisible tomorrow. Much more than introducing products alone, I believe Nouri will introduce a life giving conversation. Join us as we develop, create and share solutions to increase lives around the world. 

Caroline H. Beckman
Founder & CEO
